评论详情: I purchased this set for a one-year-old for Christmas. The fabric is thick enough to do very well in cooler temperatures above freezing, which is great for where I live. They seem to be comfortable. The colors are holding well after washing and the clothes did not shrink.  The size is great for a child between one and two years and she has room to grow into them. Hopefully they will still fit this time next year!
Disappointed.  Didn’t like the quality
Love this outfit! So stylish and cute for the little in your life. The quality is thick and sustainable. Would recommend for a lounging and comfy outfit!
Beautiful
more like a t shirt and baggy leggings. Not sweat suit material at all! I was hoping for something the boys could wear as an outfit, but don’t think this will be warm enough to wear alone.
Very cute outfit for my daughter. Love the design. Very comfortable fabric great fit.
Really cute outfit for toddler, fabric is a little thinner than I thought it would be, but still adorable
But the fabric was too thin. I thought it would be more like sweatsuit.  Top did not have a hem finish looked like it was unfinished.  Color was nice.
It appears to be in good quality appearance It is a Christmas gift
Material is super thin. Looks like the hemline was just cut with scissors. Not worth the price of the outfit.
Fit perfectly as sized

After looking at the set, thought it looked a little off. Washed prior to wear, as you should. The collar was stretched and bottom of shirt rolled up despite laying flat to dry. Don’t waste your money
Regalo a mi nietecita

This is a really cute set! It’s very thin and lightweight. I didn’t read the description well enough and thought there would be some sort of lining on the inside and was bummed when I noticed there wasn’t. Although it won’t keep my kid super warm, it’s a darling tracksuit and fits my daughter true to size.
This outfit is really adorable and a great fit for my toddler. This will be perfect for her little tumbling classes !

really cute outfit. the material is very thin but soft. i like that it is a cotton blend and not solely polyester. it is super cute on and i was afraid it would run small, but was pleasantly surprised to see thats not the case. my daughter is 7 but wears an 8/10. i got this in a 7/8 and it fits her perfectly.

The material is super thin and by no means a sweatsuit. I've received better quality from Temu for less money than I paid for this item. Extremely disappointed in the misleading description and product as a whole.
The picture shows like it's a real sweatsuit.  It is a spring season suit.  It is a very thin fabric.  Must wear fleece lining tights or pant under the suit.  Smh.
Perfect fit, super cute, great quality!
This 2-piece long sleeve and pants set is so cute!! Runs just a tad big, but I order my toddler’s size so she can grow into it. Cute, neutral design and soft material.
It looks cheap in person
Cute but light weight. Perfect transition from fall to winter. Easy to layer and fits my son well.

I absolutely love this sweat outfit!! It's seriously so cute on and is quite soft. The sweatpants have pockets that are functional and pretty deep. The top is a cute crop top without it being too short. It still goes down low enough to cover the torso but still has that cute, cropped look. The color along with the checkered detail on the side is so cute for the fall season. My daughter loves to wear it!

I like the color and pattern. I dont like that the top has no bottom seem so it just rolls up to a baby crop top... not the look I was going for. The material is very thin and the stiching is uneven. Seems to fit okay but is not a warm outfit.
Really cute with some vans. Love the style would definitely order again

I gave this outfit three stars because of the hem on the bottom of the shirt and the overall cut of the shirt. There is no defined hemline on the bottom of the shirt like typical sweatshirts so it rolls up at the bottom once washed. Since the hemline is not defined, the shirt is cut almost like a crop top  which is weird for a little boy to wear. The pants fit well and run true to size.
Way too cute! Cut true to size.
This fits great and size is accurate. The material and design and nice.
My girl had two, love this color the most
Super cute. However, the top is a crop top and I did not see this advertised anywhere for the outfit. Also doesn’t look like a crop in any of the pictures. Was not expecting that for my 2 y/o

评论概述: My son and granddaughter love this!
评论详情: Outfit fits fine and my granddaughter looks adorable in it. No photo for privacy reasons.

Bought for a friends child and I did not like the quality… felt very cheap and the shirt has a free edge so it rolls up which I would find annoying and I wouldn’t want my baby’s belly showing. I think the outfit is cute, but I wish it was a sweat shirt and pant set instead!
